description:
She was a demon used to kill Maron. She is a pure breed demon and more powerful than Noin. She had a candy box to hold demons.
She was defeated by Maron because Noin told Maron about the candy box which is Myst`s source of power. Even if it was broken by Maron, Maron takes pity and gives her back the candy box.
name: Myst
